value.title: 8 common column headers transformations you will need in Power Query
value.excerpt: In todays video, I will show you 8 common column header transformations that you will probably need to do in Power Query. Looking for a specific one? Use the keynotes below:  Keynotes:  01:00 CamelCase to Camel case 02:00 Proper casing to Proper Casing 02:24 Uppercasing to UPPERCASING 02:30 LOWERCASING

value.title: Add prefix to headers in Power Query #1: (M)agic (M)ondays
value.excerpt: In today's video you will learn how to add a prefix to all column headers using Power Query and the M language.
